alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 10:32PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Broward County through 1100 PM EDT... At 1031 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Davie, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Coral Springs, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Lauderhill, Weston, North Lauderdale, Lauderdale Lakes, Dania Beach, Cooper City, Royal Palm Ranches, Ravenswood Estates, St. George, Sunshine Acres and Estates Of Fort Lauderdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
